page.title: 08CLOVA SCHOOL SUMMER OUTING.
page.content: On Friday 21st June 29 people from the Glen went to the Blair Drummond Safari Park for the school trip.It took us 3 hours to get there but it was worth waiting for! There were lions,tigers,camels,monkeys,buffaloes etc.The first thing I did was to go on the big astraglide .It was great!It was blue and red and there were big bumps that you slid over.Then I went on a little automatic space buggy. There was a cafe nearby so we popped in and had something to eat.Then we went to see some sealions.They balanced balls and performed lots of difficult tricks.The next thing I went to see was a huge cinema.After that we went shopping in the Thistle Centre in Stirling.We left Stirling at 6pm and arrived home at 8:35pm.
